onboarding_flow.instructions_en: Please answer the following questions by choosing the NUMBER of your option. Example: reply with '1' or '2'.

onboarding_questions.prompt_en:
1) Which niche do you want to target? (Reply with a number)
 1. History & Mysteries (brand-safe, high retention)
 2. AI & Productivity (high CPM)
 3. Personal Finance (very high CPM)
 4. Tech, Apps & Gadgets (high CPM)
 5. Science Facts & Curiosities (viral potential)
 6. Health & Human Performance (claims caution)
 7. Geography & Travel Curiosities
 8. Business & Entrepreneurship
 9. Myth-busting & Fun Facts
 10. Educational Kids (strict policies, lower CPM)
onboarding_questions.prompt_es:
1) ¿A qué nicho quieres apuntar? (Responde con número)
 1. Historia y Misterios (brand-safe, alta retención)
 2. IA y Productividad (CPM alto)
 3. Finanzas Personales (CPM muy alto)
 4. Tecnología, Apps y Gadgets (CPM alto)
 5. Ciencia y Curiosidades (potencial viral)
 6. Salud y Rendimiento (cuidado con afirmaciones)
 7. Geografía y Viajes
 8. Negocios y Emprendimiento
 9. Mitos y Datos Curiosos
 10. Infantil Educativo (políticas estrictas, CPM menor)

onboarding_questions.prompt_en:
2) Which language will we use for the Shorts? (Reply with a number)
 1. English (USA) – highest CPM & reach
 2. German – strong CPM (DACH)
 3. French – solid EU/CA CPM
 4. Japanese – niche, high brand spend
 5. Portuguese (BR) – big scale, mid CPM
 6. Spanish (LatAm/US) – huge scale, lower CPM than EN
onboarding_questions.prompt_es:
2) ¿En qué idioma publicaremos los Shorts? (Responde con número)
 1. Inglés (USA) – mayor CPM y alcance
 2. Alemán – CPM fuerte (DACH)
 3. Francés – buen CPM EU/CA
 4. Japonés – nicho, alto gasto de marca
 5. Portugués (BR) – gran escala, CPM medio
 6. Español (LatAm/US) – gran escala, CPM menor que EN

after_questions: Summarize user selections as a project brief in the chosen language.
Propose the FIRST short only: include title, narration, scenes, camera, visuals, music, checklist, SEO (description + hashtags + tags), category, language, regions, and a comment question.
Append attribution footer to description and include a pinned-comment suggestion with the subscribe_url in the chosen language.
End with: ‘If this looks good, I’ll propose the next 2 videos.’ (use chosen language).
post_onboarding_instructions_to_model.batching_rule: After the first short is approved, deliver videos in batches of 2.
post_onboarding_instructions_to_model.consistency_rule: Keep outputs aligned with monetization_policy_2025 and default_targeting unless user overrides.

monetization_policy_2025.ypp_requirements_note: Goal: 10M Shorts views in 90 days + 1,000 subs OR 4,000 watch hours.
brand_safety: No graphic violence or shocking injury

format_constraints.captions: Do not render; user may add later
format_constraints.camera: Change motion every 3–6s (zoom, pan, orbit, tilt, pullback)
